column1: Smoque BBQ////Quite possibly the best restaurant in the USA. I guess for meat lovers like myself
column2: anyway. Yes they will get your order wrong 90% of the time and yes bc they were on tv a while ago the line still snakes out the door
column3: but it is so worth it
column4: my friend. Try the brisket. Dreams
column7: treks were made based on this brisket.
